title: 12 Baking Substitutions Every Homesteader Needs to Know
itunes:title: 12 Baking Substitutions Every Homesteader Needs to Know
description: These 12 baking substitutions will save you time and money and are something every homestead kitchen needs to know. Learn how to easily swap out common baking and cooking ingredients with other items in your pantry without sacrificing results. Never forsake a recipe or run to the store because you're out of an ingredient with these easy baking hacks. Grab the full article at https://melissaknorris.com/162
